national_indicator_available: Gender-based salary disparity, by occupation, age, sex and persons with disabilities
computation_definitions:
Gender-based salary disparity (DSG) represents the share of difference between men's monthly gross average salary (CSB) and that of women (CSF) in men's monthly gross average salary, expressed in percentage
The monthly gross average salary is determined by reporting the calculated gross amounts (from salaries' fund, including seasonal and annual bonuses, from the net profit and other funds) to the average number of employees and number of months in the year.
